metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2054 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In the seccomp implementation prior to kernel version 4.8, there is apossible seccomp bypass due to seccomp policies that allow the use ofptrace. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additionalexecution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android kernel Android ID:A-119769499

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-2054` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-157.185
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-157.185
